channel.title: MySQL – Rashid Azar's Weblog
channel.description: Don't document the program; program the document.

item.title: Backup MySQL Databases
item.dc:creator: warlog
item.description: If you are running a database driven website then your data sitting in MySQL database id most important for you. In most of shared hosting there is no provision for scheduled backup of databases. So I have written a script to take backup of all databases associated with the account. [crayon-5bfab19648ed6346667556/]

item.title: Install LAMP in UBUNTU 12.10 / 13.04 / 13.10
item.dc:creator: warlog
item.description: I installed Ubuntu 12.10 on my new laptop and now I have to setup LAMP on it. To setup LAMP I need to install Apache Web Server, PHP and MySQL. For installation issue following commands: [crayon-5bfab19649194099172009/] Above command will download and install Apache Web Server. It will ask for permission to download the setup file. … Continue reading Install LAMP in UBUNTU 12.10 / 13.04 / 13.10 →
